name: Every 10 seconds, mother comes in
description:
This game is Ludum Dare 51 compo entry. Note: this game has no sound.

Post-compo update:

  • You get strike for leaving your monitor on.

Game Instruction:

  • Goal: you must maximize studying and playing video game without disappointing your mother.
  • Day starts at 5:00 PM and ends at 10:00 PM
  • 10 seconds timer will disappear in mid-game.
  • Arrow key to move
  • Hold x to either study, play video game, or nap.
  • Press Z near computer to turn on monitor. CRT monitor takes time to turn on.
  • You must start with studying to start the day.
  • You get 1 strike out of 3 if mother sees you not studying, (You have to hold studying) or monitor is on.
  • You get 1 strike 1 out if mother sees you playing video game.

The year is early 2000s

  • Video games were played on Personal Computer.
  • CRT monitor took forever to turn on.
  • Teenage brain is feeble against the awesomeness of early days of MMORPG.
  • Game devs still knew the trick to lure players in with time-exclusive event.
  • Sometimes, the event happens during the test week.
  • Your mom is tired of your game addiction.
  • and she doesn’t care for your privacy.
